There is a fix planned for that (https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1647632#c6), and you can vote on this idea at (https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/allow-thunderbird-user-to-enable-disable-an-account-temporarily/idi-p/29194/. Meanwhile, here are some things to try:

- go to TB menu > Account Settings > Account > Server Settings and disable these options: 

 - Check for new messages at startup 
 - Check for new messages every X minutes 
 - Allow immediate server notification when new messages arrive 
 - Synchronization & Storage > Message Synchronizing > 'Keep messages...'
